The Boovan (ä¸æ™š) had a wonderful time performing at the 2026 Southlake Spring Festival! It was a beautiful day filled with music, culture, and community. Here are some highlights from the event.
Video: Bring Up the Wine # Group Photos # The Boovan at 2026 Southlake Spring Festival The Boovan at 2026 Southlake Spring Festival On Stage # Wenxin on vocals and guitar Wenxin and Parvel on stage Andrew on saxophone Andrew on saxophone Joel on drums Parvel on vocals Parvel performing Zhen on guitar Zhen on vocals Zhen performing Zhen and Parvel on stage Chunke singing Chunke on vocals and violin Xian at the festival Chunke and Wei Thank you to everyone who came out to celebrate the Spring Festival with us! It’s always a joy to share our music with the community.
Want us to perform at your event? Get in touch!

The Boovan # Welcome to The Boovan (ä¸æ™š), a North American Chinese band based in North Texas. We’re a group of Chinese American musicians who play for fun, love, and the people we care about.
What We Do # We’re not just about making music â€“ we’re about bringing joy to our community through:
Live Performances - Band performances for events, parties, and celebrations Demo Music - Original songs and covers that speak to our hearts Sound Services - Professional DJ and sound equipment services Music Production - Helping others bring their musical visions to life Our Philosophy # Never Too Late - It’s never too late to pursue your passions, to make music, to bring people together, and to celebrate life with the people you love.

Welcome to The Boovan Website! # We’re excited to launch our new website! This is your hub for everything related to The Boovan - from our music to our services to upcoming events.
What You’ll Find Here # Our Music: Listen to our demo songs and recordings Our Services: Learn about our band performances, equipment rental, DJ services, and music production About Us: Get to know the band and our story News & Updates: Stay informed about our latest activities What’s Next? # We’re working on:
Adding more demo songs and recordings Scheduling upcoming performances Building our community presence Creating new original music Stay Connected # This is just the beginning! We’ll be posting regular updates about our music, performances, and community events.
Never Too Late to start something new - and this website is our way of connecting with you and our community.
Have questions or want to work with us? Get in touch!

Our Story # The Boovan (ä¸æ™š) was born from a simple idea: it’s never too late to make music that matters. We’re a group of Chinese American musicians based in the North Texas area who came together to share our love of music with our community.
Our name “ä¸æ™š” (BÃ¹ WÇn) means “Never Too Late” â€“ a reminder that it’s never too late to pursue your dreams, make music, and share joy with others.
Our Mission # We believe music has the power to:
Bring people together across generations and cultures Create lasting memories at life’s important moments Express emotions and stories that words alone cannot capture Build and strengthen our Chinese American community Whether we’re performing at a wedding, a community celebration, or producing a heartfelt song, our goal is always the same: to spread joy and connection through music.
What Makes Us Different # Community-Focused: We’re a non-profit band that plays primarily for our friends, family, and local Chinese American community Bilingual & Bicultural: We celebrate both our Chinese heritage and American experiences through our music For the Love of It: While we offer professional services, our primary motivation is the joy of making music together Never Too Late: We prove that it’s never too late to pursue your passions and share your talents Our Values # Joy First: Music should be fun for both performers and listeners Community Connection: We prioritize serving our local community Cultural Pride: We celebrate our Chinese American identity through our work Quality & Passion: We approach every performance and project with dedication Accessibility: We believe great music and professional services should be available to everyone Listen to Our Music See Our Services Contact Us

We’d love to hear from you! Whether you’re interested in booking us for an event, renting equipment, or just want to say hello, reach out to us. Service Booking & Inquiries # Fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you within 1-2 business days. Select your services to see estimated pricing.
Name * Email * Phone Event Date (if applicable) Service Category * Please select a service... Live Band Performance Sound Services (delivered & setup) PA Rental (customer pickup) ğŸ‰ Bundle Packages â€” Save More! Other / General Inquiry Live Band Performance 1 set (1 hr) â€” $300 2 sets (2 hr) â€” $500 3 sets (3 hr) â€” $800 Extra hours (+$200/hr) âš  Band performance does not include PA or sound services. If the venue does not provide these, please add them below:
Add: PA + mics + setup/teardown â€” +$200 Add: Sound engineer â€” +$40/hr Sound engineer hours Add: Music playback during breaks â€” +$50 Add: MC/announcements â€” +$50 Sound Services PA + mics + setup/teardown â€” $200 Add: Sound engineer â€” +$40/hr Sound engineer hours Add: Music playback during breaks â€” +$50 Add: MC/announcements â€” +$50 PA Rental (customer pickup) Basic (speakers + cables) â€” $75/day (deposit: $200) Full (speakers + XR18 mixer + mics) â€” $125/day (deposit: $350) Number of rental days Deposit refunded upon return in good condition.
ğŸ‰ Bundle Packages â€” Save More! ğŸ¸ Full Event â€” 1-set band (1 hr) + PA + sound engineer + music between sets (4 hrs total) â€” $710 $600 ğŸ§ Sound Only â€” PA + sound engineer + music playback (4 hrs) â€” $410 $300 Please describe your needs in the message below.
Additional Services Recording Services
Live stereo recording â€” +$100 Multitrack recording â€” +$200 Post-event mix/master â€” +$150 Additional Fees
Travel beyond 30 miles ($1/mile) Extra microphone rental ($15 each) Estimated Price Estimated Total: $0 * This is an estimate. Final pricing may vary based on your specific needs.
Message * Send Booking Request Other Ways to Reach Us # Email Us Directly: info@boovan.org â€” We’d love to hear from you! Response Time: We typically respond within 1-2 business days. For urgent inquiries, please mention “urgent” in your message subject. Booking Lead Time: For events, we recommend reaching out at least 4-6 weeks in advance when possible, though we’ll do our best to accommodate shorter timelines. Frequently Asked Questions # Q: What areas do you serve? A: We’re based in North Texas and primarily serve the DFW metroplex and surrounding areas. For events outside this area, please contact us to discuss.
Q: Do you travel for events? A: Yes! We can travel for events. Travel fees may apply for locations outside our primary service area.
Q: What’s your cancellation policy? A: We understand that plans change. Please contact us as soon as possible if you need to reschedule or cancel. We’ll work with you to find a solution.
Q: Can you play specific songs or genres? A: Absolutely! We love taking requests. Let us know your preferences and we’ll do our best to accommodate.
Q: Are you available for rehearsals or consultations? A: Yes, we can schedule meetings to discuss your event needs and even do a preview performance if needed.
View Our Services Learn More About Us

content:
Professional music and sound services for your community events, celebrations, and special occasions. What We Offer # ğŸ¸ Band Performances # Live music performances for your events:
Weddings & Receptions - Make your special day memorable with live music Community Events - Festivals, celebrations, and cultural gatherings Private Parties - Birthdays, anniversaries, and family celebrations Corporate Events - Professional entertainment for business functions Our diverse repertoire includes Chinese classics, American standards, and contemporary favorites in both English and Chinese.
ğŸµ Sound Equipment Rental # Professional-grade sound equipment for your events:
PA Systems & Speakers Microphones (wired and wireless) Mixing Boards Monitors and Stage Equipment Complete sound packages for various venue sizes Perfect for community events, presentations, parties, and performances.
ğŸ§ DJ & Sound Services # Professional DJ and sound engineering services:
Event DJ Services - Music curation and live mixing for your celebration Sound Engineering - Professional audio setup and management Technical Support - On-site assistance throughout your event Music Consultation - Help selecting the perfect playlist for your occasion We specialize in both Chinese and American music, creating the perfect atmosphere for multicultural events.
ğŸ¼ Song Production # Professional music production services:
Original Song Recording - Bring your musical ideas to life Cover Songs - Professional recordings of your favorite songs Special Occasion Songs - Custom music for weddings, anniversaries, etc. Voice Recording - Vocals for demos, gifts, or special projects Whether it’s a heartfelt gift or a passion project, we’ll help you create quality recordings.
Why Choose The Boovan? # Community-Focused: We understand the needs of the Chinese American community and multicultural events. Bilingual Services: Fluent in both English and Chinese, perfect for multicultural celebrations. Passion-Driven: We bring genuine enthusiasm and joy to every project and performance. Professional Quality: Despite being a non-profit band, we maintain professional standards. Pricing # Live Band # Package Price 1 set (1 hr) $300 2 sets (2 hr) $500 3 sets (3 hr) $800 Extra hour +$200 Sound Services (delivered and setup) # Service Price PA + mics + setup/teardown $200 Sound engineer $40/hr Add: Music playback during breaks +$50 Add: MC/announcements +$50 PA Rental (customer pickup) # Package Price/Day Deposit Basic (speakers + cables) $75 $200 Full (speakers + XR18 mixer + mics) $125 $350 Deposit refunded upon return in good condition.
Recording Services # Service Price Live stereo recording +$100 Multitrack recording +$200 Post-event mix/master +$150 ğŸ‰ Bundles â€” Save More! # Package Includes Price ğŸ¸ Full Event 1-set band (1 hr) + PA + sound engineer + music between sets (4 hrs total) $710 $600 ğŸ§ Sound Only PA + sound engineer + music playback (4 hrs) $410 $300 Additional Fees # Travel beyond 30 miles: $1/mile Extra microphone rental: $15 each Equipment List # Behringer XR18 digital mixer PA speakers Microphones (wired/wireless) All necessary cables Laptop/tablet for mixer control and music playback Recording via Reaper (multitrack capable) Request a Quote Learn More About Us Booking Process # Contact Us - Fill out our contact form or reach out directly Discuss Details - We’ll talk about your event, needs, and vision Custom Quote - Receive a tailored proposal for your event Confirmation - Book your date and finalize details Event Day - We’ll bring professionalism, energy, and great music! Note: As a community-focused non-profit band, we prioritize events within our local Chinese American community and area. Contact us to discuss your specific needs!
